description: Discover the best hotels in Maamunagau Island, Maldives. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Maldives Private Island Escape near Unique Manta Ray Sanctuary
hotels.description: Be one with nature at the tranquil InterContinental Maldives Maamunagau Resort, an IHG Hotel, floating on the azure waters of the immaculate Raa Atoll. Be lulled into a state of serene relaxation by the tidal lullaby of the Indian Ocean as you live out your tropical-island fantasies within an impressive villa or residence. Pamper yourself at the ethereal AVI Spa or savour a sumptuous seafood dinner at any of the world-class restaurants and bars. With the stunning resort positioned near one of Maldivesâ€™ UNESCO Biosphere Reserves, the protected Hanifaru Bay sanctuary, staying here means once-in-a-lifetime opportunities to view a rich and diverse marine habitat boasting large populations of whale sharks and endangered manta rays.

seo.title: Hotels in Maamunagau Island - Maldives Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
